name: coinbase_scrape_market
description: Scrape the Coinbase market overview. Returns top cryptocurrencies with prices and changes.

steps.code: const assets = []; document.querySelectorAll('table tbody tr, a[href*="/price/"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i >= 30) return; const name = el.querySelector('td:first-child, h2, p')?.textContent?.trim() || el.textContent?.trim() || ''; const price = el.querySelector('td:nth-child(2), [class*="Price"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const change = el.querySelector('td:nth-child(3), [class*="Change"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const link = el.querySelector('a[href*="/price/"]') || (el.matches?.('a[href*="/price/"]') ? el : null); const url = link ? link.href : ''; if (name && name.length < 100) assets.push({ name, price, change_24h: change, url }); }); return { assets, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
